verses.content: “Chuleiin, LALPA in Pathien chu in hmangaiin a thuruot- hai, a dânhai, a rorêlhai, a thupêk- hai chu in zâwm rawp ding a nih.
Tuhin lo hre unla, LALPA in Pathien thununna dâm, a ropuizie dâm, a bân hrâtzie dâm, a bân pharzie dâm,
a inchikna dâm, a thilthaw Aigupta ram sûnga Aigupta lal Pharao chung le a ram sûng po poa a thaw dâm kha.
Aigupta sipaihai le an sakawrhai le an tawlailîr chunga a thilthawhai kha, an hnawt lai cheua Tuisuoriet Sen tuia ân chimtirzie dâm; tu chena LALPAIN a sukbohmangzie dâm,
hi hmun in tlung hmakhata thlalêra in chunga a thilthaw dân dâm,

Reuben naupa Eliab naupa Dathan le Abiram hai chunga a thaw dân dam; hnuoiin a bâu a ka a, Israel mi po po lai anni le an sûnghai le an puon inhai le an ran ṭhuoi po po a lem vawng dân dâm hre lo in thlahai kuoma hril ka ni nawh a,
in mit ngeia LALPAIN thil ropuitak a thaw po po hmutuhai kuomah a ni lem a nih.
“Chuleiin, in hung hrât a, in va pan ram chu in hluo theina dingin tuta thu ka pêk cheu, thupêk po po hi in zâwm ding a nih;
nênetui le khuoizu luongna ram, in pi le puhai le an thlahai pêk dinga LALPAIN ṭawng a lo inkhâmna tah rama chun in chêng sâwt theina dingin.
In va hluo ding ram chu in hung suokna Aigupta ram, thlai huona chi in tu a, in kea tui in buokna hlak ang a ni nawh a;
in va hluo ding ram chu tlânghai le ruomhai le vân ruotui dawng ram a ni lem a.
LALPA in Pathienin a lungkham ram a nih; LALPA in Pathien mit chu kum thara inthawka a tâwp chenin a fu hlak.
“Chun, LALPA in Pathien chu hmangai ding le in lungril po po le in lungvar po poa a rawngbâwl dinga ka thupêk tuta ka pêk cheu hi ṭha- hnemngaitaka in zâwm chun,
in ram ruotui chu a huntakah, ruotui tla hmasa le ruotui tla nuhnung chu pêng ka ti cheu a, chuongchun, in bu dâm, in uoin dâm, in hriek dâm sîk khâwm thei in tih.
In ranhai ta dingin in rama hlohna khawm inumtir bawk ka ta, nangni khawma fâng in ta, tlai in tih.
Fîmkhur ro khai, chuong naw chun, in lungril chu hlêmin um a ta, pêthmang in ta, pathien dang rawng dâm bâwl in ta, be el rawi in tih;

chuong a ni chun LALPA lung chu in chungah hung inthawk a ta, vân chu khâr a ta, ruo sûr naw nih a; hnuoi chun a ra insuo naw ni a, chuongchun, LALPA pêk cheu, ram ṭhataka inthawk hi bohmang vak el in tih.
“Chuleiin, hieng ka thuhai hi in lungril le, in lungvarah khum inta, inchikna dingin in bânah zem in ta, in mit le mit inkârah chalhrênna dingin a um bawk ding a nih.
Chuong chu in nauhai inchûktir in ta, in ina in ṭhung lai dâmin, lampuia in fe lai dâmin, in zâl lai dâmin, in tho pha khawm in hril hlak ding a nih.
Chun, in kawtkhâr bienghaiah, in kawtkhâra dâm in ziek ding a nih.
Chuongchun, in pi le puhai pêk dinga ṭawng ân khâmna rama chun in dam sûng ni le in nauhai dam sûng nihai chu hnuoi chungah vân hai um sûng sâwt ang peiin sukseiin um a tih.
“LALPA in Pathien chu hmangai ding le, a lampui po po hraw ding le ama chel tlat dinga ṭha- hnemngaitaka hieng thu ka pêk cheu thupêk po po hi in zâwm phawt chun,
LALPA chun hieng hnamhai po po hi hnawt suokpêk a ti cheu a, nangni nêka ropui le thilthawthei lem hnam ram chu hluong in tih.
In kephaa in sirna taphawt chu in ta nîng a tih, thlalêra inthawk le Lebanon tlânga inthawka vadung, Euphrates vadunga inthawk chun thlangtieng tuisuoriet chenin in ram nîng a tih.
Tukhawm in hmaah ngîr thei naw ni hai a; LALPA in Pathienin in kuoma a hril ta ang khan in va sir ding ram po poa chun nangni ṭina le ṭiumna inumtir a tih.
Ngai ta u, vawisûn hin in hmaah malsâwmna le ṭawngsie ka sieh a;
LALPA in Pathien thupêkhai tuta ka pêk cheu hi in zâwm chun malsâwmna,
LALPA in Pathien thupêkhai chu in zâwm nawh a, in hriet ngai lo pathien danghai be dinga tuta ka thupêk cheu hi in pêtsan chun ṭawngsephurin um in tih.
“Chun, in va hluo ding rama LALPA in Pathienin a ṭhuoi lût pha cheu chun, malsâwmna chu Gerizim tlângah sieng in ta, ṭawngsie chu Ebal tlângah.
Chu tlânghai chu nisa tlâkna khêl Araba tieng lampuia um, Kanaan mihai ram, Gilgal zâwn, More thingsaisuo sîr, Jordan râla um an nih.
LALPA in Pathienin a pêk cheu ram va hluo ding chun Jordan chu in kân ding a na, hluong in ta, chutaka chun um in tih.
Chun, tuta in hmaa ka sie, thuruot le rorêl po po hi zâwm dingin in fîmkhur ding a nih.
